content.en: Optimal Power Flow: Researchers have been exploring different algorithms to solve the Optimal Power Flow (OPF) problem, which involves optimizing the power flow in electrical systems. These algorithms include Enhanced Genetic Algorithm (EGA), Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), Shuffle Frog Leaping algorithms (SFLA), and many others. The goal is to improve the efficiency and accuracy of these algorithms in solving the OPF problem, considering factors like generator constraints, multi-fuel types, and wind and solar generation uncertainty.
content.da: Optimal Power Flow: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer til at løse Optimal Power Flow (OPF) problemet, som indebærer optimering af strømflowet i elektriske systemer. Disse algoritmer inkluderer Enhanced Genetic Algorithm (EGA), Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), Shuffle Frog Leaping algoritmer (SFLA), og mange andre. Målet er at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af disse algoritmer i løsningen af OPF problemet, under hensyntagen til faktorer som generatorbegrænsninger, multifueltyper, samt usikkerhed i vind- og solenergi.
